sentences.sContent: Actually, I like being an android.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，我喜欢做个机器人。

sentences.sContent: University students from all around the country brought their android friends to participate in the competition.
sentences.sCn: 来自全国各地的大学生们带着他们的机器人朋友来参加本次比赛。

trans.tranOther: a  robot  that looks completely human
